Actions.Name: Complete a task
Actions.Description: This operation marks the given task as complete.

Actions.Name: Complete a task (Preview)
Actions.Description: Completes a task and sets the CompletedDateTime property to the current date, and Status property to Completed.

Actions.Name: Create a task [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Create a task instead.
This operation is used to create a task in the specified task folder (defaults to My Tasks).

Actions.Name: Create a task (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new task in the default task folder (Tasks) in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: Create a task folder
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new folder. Optionally, you may choose to put the new folder in an existing task group.

Actions.Name: Create a task folder (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new task folder in the default task group (My Tasks) in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: Create a task folder in a task group (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new task folder in the specified task group in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: Create a task group
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create a new task group in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: Create a task group (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new task group in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: Create a task in folder (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new task in the specified task folder in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: Create a task (V2)
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create a task in the specified task folder (defaults to My Tasks).

Actions.Name: Delete a task (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation will delete an existing task.

Actions.Name: List all task folders (Preview)
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all the task folders in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: List all task groups (Preview)
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all the task groups in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: List all tasks
Actions.Description: This operation returns a list of all your tasks.

Actions.Name: List all tasks (Preview)
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all your tasks in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: Get a task
Actions.Description: This operation is used to retrieve the details of a task by its id.

Actions.Name: Get a task (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation gets a specific task.

Actions.Name: Get a task folder (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation gets a specific task folder.

Actions.Name: List task folders in group
Actions.Description: Returns a list of task folders in the given task group.

Actions.Name: List task folders in group (Preview)
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all the task folders in the specified task group in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: Get a task group (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation gets a specific task group.

Actions.Name: List all task groups
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all the task groups in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: List tasks in folder
Actions.Description: This operation returns a list of tasks in a given folder.

Actions.Name: List tasks in folder (Preview)
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all your tasks in the specified task folder in your mailbox.

Actions.Name: Mark a task as incomplete
Actions.Description: This operation is used to mark the given task as incomplete.

Actions.Name: When a task is completed
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a task is marked as complete.

Actions.Name: When a task is added
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new task is created.

Actions.Name: Update a task (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation is used to modify an existing task.

Actions.Name: Update a task folder (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation is used to modify an existing task folder.

Actions.Name: Update a task group (Preview)
Actions.Description: This operation is used to modify an existing task group.
